Articles.Content: Hello, i see that 1.4 is avaible, but i dont know to download it, while i have mac and download from gog.com

GOG is a few days behind other sources. You may as well wait for 1.4.1 to drop this Tuesday, although again, GOG will be a few days behind. I don't know how long it usually takes for GOG to catch up, a week maybe?
I see 1.4 update already in gog galaxy, but on Win, so can't help about mac
